CREATE TABLE [dbo].[SYS_REPORT_REQUEST]( [REPORT_REQUEST_ID] [decimal](22, 0) NOT NULL, [MODULE_ID] [varchar](35) NULL, [INVOCATION_MODE] [varchar](35) NULL, [PARAMETER_COUNT] [int] NULL, [PARAMETER_DELIMITER] [varchar](1) NULL, [PARAMETER_NAMES] [varchar](250) NULL, [PARAMETER_TYPES] [varchar](250) NULL, [PARAMETER_VALUES] [varchar](250) NULL, [SQL] [varchar](2000) NULL, [PRINT_QUEUE_NAME] [varchar](250) NULL, [PRINT_COPIES] [int] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_SYS_REPORT_REQUEST] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [REPORT_REQUEST_ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
